resources.string:
Thanks for using AnBox. Please, drive safely and have a good day
 
 Notice: This program is using Google map and SMS for sending a SOS message. This may charge you additional data and SMS costs. If you don't want to use these features, please, disable data connection at System Settings -> Wireless and networks -> Data network setting -> Not allowed and don't check 'Send SOS message when a collision is detected' item of this program's setting menu to disable SMS
 
 Will start to record vision and sensors within 10 seconds. If you want other task, select a button below
If checked, it use only limited storage.
Storage capacity for recording normal data
Limit storage for recording normal data upto...
Limit storage for recording collision data upto...
Please, check whether external storage is mounted in read-write mode

Thanks for using AnBox. It is required to calibrate sensors the first time when you use AnBox. Please, follow the instruction when calibrating sensors.
 
 Notice: This program is using Google map and SMS for sending a SOS message. This may charge you additional data and SMS costs. If you don't want to use these features, please, disable data connection at System Settings -> Wireless and networks -> Data network setting -> Not allowed and don't check 'Send SOS message when a collision is detected' item of this program's setting menu to disable SMS
 
 Will start to record vision and sensors within 10 seconds. If you want other task, select a button below
Update period for sensor data file
If checked, sensor calibration will executed next time
High value means the most sensitive
Send SOS message when a collision is detected
If a collision is detected, a SOS message will be sent to configured numbers
Please check if an accident occur at location [addr], [gps]. Call 911
Phone number list to be sent to
SOS message will be sent to these numbers
Time for which a user can cancel
The program will wait user to cancel for this amount of time

AnBox is a synonym for Android blackbox and a blackbox program for your smart phone which can capture various sensors(including vision) while you're driving. Captured data may show you're not responsible for an accident when there is a debate about who's responsible for it
 
 Authored by iVehicle Lab
 Version: 1.2
 
 Change Log:
 v1.2: Bug fix release of v1.0
 - Added initial screen that allows user to select either record, view, or setting function
 - Bug fixes related to speed/orientation
 - Improved reliability
 - Doesn't jump into setting screen at the 1st execution
 - Bigger font at view screen
 
 Phone info:
Failed to start preview. Please, retry
Please, don\'t move, while calibrating sensors
